description:
Bites fast and chews in quick. The shape of the drilling teeth is designed to bite in about a quarter turn, so you can get your screws started rapidly. The integrated crank applies efficient leverage to wind them in with one hand even at awkward angles. A smallish hanger is easier to place in sculpted ice, but big enough to grip with gloves or cold fingers.

  • Shaft is treated stainless steel, hanger is aluminum
  • Colour-coded cranking handles make identification easier
  • Swivelling crank on the hanger allows fast placement and removal
  • Sharpening reserve on the teeth helps with filing
name: Petzl Laser Speed Ice Screw
